articles.title: Justin Bieber enlists stars including Kylie Jenner and Ariana Grande to wish Jazmyn happy birthday - Daily Mail
articles.description: Justin Bieber rounded up some of the world's biggest stars to send wishes to his little sister Jazmyn on her 12th birthday. Stars included The Smith Family, Jenner sisters and Ariana Grande.
articles.content:
He has been isolating at his home in Canada with wife Hailey Baldwin over the past few months.  
And Justin Bieber's visit home meant he was there to celebrate his sister Jazmyn's 12th birthday on Tuesday.

articles.title: National Trust properties taken over by orcas, otters, bats and rare birds after people cease to visit - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: People are slowly being allowed back to properties, with car park slots selling out on the first day
articles.content: The lakes and gardens, usually thronged with visitors, are now full of curious creatures. Little Owls have been spotted at Ham House, London, and at Plas yn Rhiw, on the Llyn Peninsula, stoats, weasels and hares have come in from the woodland to explore the g… [+1221 chars]

articles.title: ‘Twilight’ actor Gregory Tyree Boyce has died - NME
articles.description: Gregory Tyree Boyce, who played Tyler Crowley in 'Twilight', has died. Police found Boyce and his girlfriend Natalie Adepoju dead in a Las Vegas condominium
articles.content:
Twilight actor Gregory Tyree Boyce has died, aged 30.
Boyce and his girlfriend Natalie Adepoju were found dead by police in a Las Vegas condominium last Wednesday (May 13).
Their cause of death is pending toxicology results, although police have ruled that … [+1055 chars]
